I'm your AI assistant for site editing. I can help you modify design, content, layout, and logic. Just describe what you want to change:
aiSiteEditor.inputPlaceholder: Describe what you want to change on your site...
aiSiteEditor.error: An error occurred while processing the request
aiSiteEditor.designChangesDesc: Change colors, fonts, sizes, animations, and CSS styles
aiSiteEditor.contentChangesDesc: Edit texts, translations, titles, and descriptions
aiSiteEditor.layoutChangesDesc: Change component structure and element positioning
aiSiteEditor.logicChangesDesc: Add new features, fix bugs, change behavior
aiSiteEditor.fullControlDesc: Comprehensive changes affecting design, content, layout, and logic simultaneously. Full freedom in site editing.
aiSiteEditor.guideTitle: How to Use AI Site Editor
aiSiteEditor.step1Desc: Simply describe what you want to change on your site. For example:
aiSiteEditor.step2Desc: AI determines the change type (design, content, layout, logic) and checks availability for your plan.
aiSiteEditor.step3Desc: AI will provide you with code changes with detailed comments and application instructions.
aiSiteEditor.step4Desc: You can apply the changes or revert them at any time if you're not satisfied with the result.
aiSiteEditor.tip3: Break complex tasks into multiple steps
aiSiteEditor.tip4: Review the suggested code before applying
